title: Jaws
desc: When the seaside community of Amity finds itself under attack by a dangerous great white shark, the town's chief of police, a young marine biologist, and a grizzled hunter embark on a desperate quest to destroy the beast before it strikes again.

title: Jaws 2
desc: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.
